Release 2.3.1 – 2017-03-10

Type Changes By
Vortex Gateway is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.3.1. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-298.
Fixed "%1 is not a valid Win32 application" error occuring on Windows with Maven 3.3.9, when installing Vortex Gateway with command "mvn -f VortexGateway-installation.pom". Fixes BB-299.

Release 2.3.0 – 2016-09-22

Type Changes By
Vortex Gateway is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.3.0. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-287.
Vortex Cafï¿½ now supports Java 7 and 8. It's tested with both Oracle Java 8 and OpenJDK 8. Note that Java 6 is no longer supported. Fixes BB-288.
The Maven build system for examples have been updated to build with Apache Maven 3.3.x. Apache Maven 3.3.9 is now delivered with Vortex Gateway, in place of Apache Maven 3.0.5. Fixes BB-289.

Release 2.2.2 – 2016-04-22

Type Changes By
Vortex Gateway is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.2.2. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-276.
Fix tables rendering in PDF User Guide. Fixes BB-277.

Release 2.2.1 – 2016-02-17

Type Changes By
Update all the "shapes-*" examples to work with Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.2.1 iShapes example, but also with OpenSplice and Lite iShapes demos. Fixes BB-251.
Vortex Gateway is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.2.1. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-268.
Fix the shapes-java example when using the DynamicPollEnricher. Fixes BB-271.

Release 2.2.0 – 2015-11-25

Type Changes By
Vortex Gateway is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.2.0. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-248.

Release 2.1.2 – 2015-07-08

Type Changes By
Add a 'ignoreLocalPublishers' option (boolean; true by default) to the camel-ospl component. When true, this option avoids loop in case of bridge pattern (1 route to DDS + 1 route from DDS). Fixes BB-207.
Add options to the camel-ddsi component to set QoS at topic-level (see user guide for the full list of options). Fixes BB-238.
Fix opensplice-idl-plugin to accept files with ".IDL" (uppercase) as extension. Fixes BB-240.

Release 2.1.1 – 2015-03-09

Type Changes By
Add an etc/ directory in Vortex Gateway installation directory. User can copy its license file within. Fixes BB-215.
Change user guide document to be available in both HTML and PDF formats. Remove installation guide, as now part of the Vortex installer. Fixes BB-222.
Vortex Gateway is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.1.1. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-229.
Fix warning displayed by idl2j, the camel-ospl component and the camel-ddsi component: "Java HotSpot(TM) Server VM warning: You have loaded library /tmp/librlm913-5386386880551815362.so which might have disabled stack guard". Fixes OSPL-5470.
Fix issue with OpenSplice 6.5.0 (and upper versions) leading a camel-ospl endpoint to not receive DDS samples under certain circumstances. NOTE that this means that Gateway version prior to 2.1.1 won't work correctly with OpenSplice 6.5.0 and following versions. Fixes BB-236.

Release 2.1.0 – 2014-10-06

Type Changes By
Update RLM licensing library to no more require environment variables. As a consequence the "release.com" file is no more generated and doesn't need to be sourced any more. Please see the Vortex Installation Guide for the installation of your license file. Fixes BB-212.
Vortex Web is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.1.0. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-211.
Update the LICENSE terms (see LICENSE.html). Fixes BB-213.

Release 2.0.1 – 2014-08-01

Type Changes By
Vortex Gateway's camel-ddsi is now based on Vortex Cafï¿½ 2.0.1. The camel-ddsi component benefits some of its fixes and improvements (see Cafï¿½'s changes). Fixes BB-204.

Release 2.0.0 – 2014-07-11

Type Changes By
Changed product name to "Vortex Gateway" This implies following changes: 1- In all pom.xml file Maven groupId change org.opensplice.gateway to com.prismtech.gateway 2- In Java source code : change org.opensplice.gateway to com.prismtech.gateway . Fixes BB-157.
Changed default Camel version to 2.10.0.redhat-60060 . Fixes BB-141.
The camel-ddsi component uses the same DDSI implementation than Vortex Cafï¿½ v2.0.0 . Fixes BB-158.
The logging have been improved. The logs are prefixed with "gateway.ospl" for the camel-ospl component, and with "gateway.ddsi" for the camel-ddsi component. Fixes BB-160.
Added descriptions in User Guide of the Camel headers used by each component. Fixes BB-187.
In Camel-ddsi component, the "networkInterfaces" option has been renamed to "networkInterface" and accepts only 1 interface name. Multi-homed hosts (with several interfaces) was actually badly supported. Fixes BB-192.
Removed the "preprocessor" option from opensplice-idl-plugin since latest idlpp versions (since Vortex OpenSplice 6.4.1) removed the equivalent -c option. Fixes BB-195.
Fix "java.null.NullPointerException" in camel-ddsi when receiving a message with a null payload (e.g. a message indicating an instance has been disposed). Fixes BB-193.

Release 1.3.1 – 2013-09-13

Type Changes By
Add a 'readMode' option to camel-ospl to have the consumer endpoint using the DDS DataReader.read() operation instead of DataReader.take() operation. Fixes BB-149.

Release 1.3.0 – 2013-03-28

Type Changes By
Add DDSI over TCP mode. NOTE: this is experimental. No dynamic discovery (static configuration of peers) and no NAT trasversal capabilities. Fixes BB-92.
OpenSplice Gateway now uses the the same DDSI implementation than OpenSplice Mobile. It also uses OpenSplice Mobile's iShapes demo for it's own shapes-* examples. (WARNING: Java 7 is required for iShapes demo) Fixes BB-140.
Add 'networkInterfaces' option to camel-ddsi to choose the network insterfaces to use. Fixes BB-128.
Add 'registerType' option to camel-ddsi to register the Topic type with another name that the classname. Fixes BB-143.
Fix ResolveEndpointFailedException in camel-message-mode example. Fixes BB-130.

Release 1.2.0 – 2012-08-02

Type Changes By
Add dynamic QoS for camel-ospl endpoint. See User Guide for more information. Fixes BB-90.
Add support of fragmentation of large data in DDSI protocol implementation (used by camel-ddsi endpoint). This is transparent to user and is automatically activated for data larger than 1280 bytes. Fixes BB-106.
Add examples of DDS bridging over TCP/HTTP/HTTPS/WebSocket using camel-ddsi endpoint (see examples/shapes-ddsi-bridges). Fixes BB-83.
Add a graphical example of a graphical Web page polling DDS data via REST URLs (see examples/shapes-java). Fixes BB-115.
Change the dependency to Apache Camel version 2.9.0.fuse-7-061. Note that OpenSplice Gateway 1.2.0 has also been successfully tested with versions 2.8.5, 2.9.3 and 2.10.0. Fixes BB-103.
Add list of dependencies licenses in third_party_licenses.html file. Fixes BB-119.
Using camel-ospl endpoint, some routes may cause a StackOverflowError for each message, with lot of calls to ClassLoader in stack trace. Fixes BB-102.
Using camel-ddsi on Windows, when 2 Gateway processes are started on the same host with routes using the same DDS Domain, one of the process doesn't receive any DDS data. Fixes BB-108.
Using camel-ddsi, a process might be blocked at the end of main() operation, because of pending resources. Fixes BB-109.

Release 1.1.1 – 2012-04-13

Type Changes By
examples/shapes-ddsi compilation fails on Windows. Fixes BB-78.

Release 1.1.0 – 2012-04-13

Type Changes By
Add a new Camel component based on Java DDSI implementation. See User Guide for more information. Fixes BB-60.
Add creation of a Maven Repository package for offline installation and examples run. See Installation Guide for more information. Fixes BB-74.
Add a new PingPong example (compatible with Vortex OpenSplice's PingPong example). Fixes BB-8.
Add in shapes-java example an route using CEP (Complex Event Processing) with camel-esper component. Fixes BB-10.
Add blocking behavior to the DDSPollingConsumer's receive() and receive(timeout) operations (receiveNoWait() operation keeps non-blocking behavior). Fixes BB-67.
Change the separator character to be used in "partition" option for "dds:" URI. ',' (comma) has to be used instead of '%' ('%' is also the escape character in URIs). Fixes BB-72.
Change the Camel version to 2.8.0-fuse-03-06. Fixes BB-73.
With Vortex OpenSplice evaluation versions, the opensplice-idl-plugin fail to compile a valid IDL. Fixes BB-76.

Release 1.0.4 – 2012-01-04

Type Changes By
Obfuscate camel-ospl jar. Fixes BB-29.
DDS entities are not deleted at Camel route stop. And in DdsPollingConsumer, ReadCondition/QueryCondition objects are not deleted after the pull has finished. Fixes BB-65.
After switch to Camel 2.7.1 chatroom-webservice example failed. Consequently it was removed from releases. Fixes BB-23.
The ZIP delivery file contains directories in 777 mode. Fixes BB-59.
Update copyright headers for 2012. Fixes BB-66.

Release 1.0.3 – 2011-11-16

Type Changes By
Provide support for 64 bit Windows and Solaris. Fixes BB-57.

Release 1.0.2 – 2011-10-26

Type Changes By
Change "BlendBox" name to "Gateway". Fixes BB-56.
Documentation improvement. Fixes BB-54.

Release 1.0.1 – 2011-10-12

Type Changes By
Add a way for user to generate configuration information to be sent to support in case of troubles. Fixes BB-51.
Importing a BlendBox Maven project in Eclipse causes following error: "Plugin execution not covered by lifecycle configuration: org.opensplice.b2:opensplice-idl-plugin:1.0.0:idl-compile" Fixes BB-52.
In v1.0.0 the rlm/pom.xml has version 1.0.0 but the parent-pom/pom.xml depends on rlm version 9.1.3. Fixes BB-49.

Release 1.0.0 – 2011-10-05

Type Changes By
First release
